Classes and functions for manipulating spectra.

Table of Sub-Modules

darkhistory.spec.spectools Functions useful for processing spectral data.
darkhistory.spec.spectrum Contains the Spectrum class.
darkhistory.spec.spectra Contains the Spectra class.
darkhistory.spec.transferfunction transferfunction contains functions and classes for processing transfer functions.
darkhistory.spec.transferfunclist transferfunclist contains functions and classes for processing lists of transfer functions.
